name: Mr. Binoy Saikia
quote:
Dear Parents and Students,

Welcome to Decent Public School, where we believe that every child is unique and possesses unlimited potential. Our commitment is to provide an environment that nurtures this potential through quality education, strong values, and holistic development.

At DPS, we go beyond textbooks. Our dedicated faculty works tirelessly to ensure that students not only excel academically but also develop critical thinking, creativity, and character. We prepare our students not just for examinations, but for life.

I invite you to be part of our school family, where together we can shape the future leaders of tomorrow.

name: Jintu Ch Patowary
quote:
Dear Parents and Students,

Education is a shared commitment between dedicated teachers, motivated students, and enthusiastic parents. As Vice Principal, I am delighted to welcome you to another promising academic year at Decent Public School.

Our goal is to foster an inclusive community where every student feels valued and inspired to learn. We strive to maintain high academic standards while ensuring the emotional and social well-being of our children.

Together, let us build a foundation of trust and excellence that empowers our students to face the future with confidence.

name: Leepika Patowary
quote: Empowering students to reach their full potential through creative learning.

quote: Building a strong foundation for future leaders of tomorrow.
